page.title: 02FLIXTON MEADOWS.
page.content: Flixton meadows is a very quiet place it is smaller than Urmston meadows and is mainly used for walking and keeping horses on. I take my dog every day and see many other people exercising their dogs there. In summertime you can smell freshly mown grass and wild flowers. There is quite a lot of wildlife around, mostly rabbits but also foxes. On hot days there are water rats on the banks of the Mersey. In summer the meadows are wild and overgrown, but in winter the newly-planted trees are bare and snow often covers the ground.
